Image2Characters.myClassifier.Classifier¶

class Image2Characters.myClassifier.Classifier(npImage=None, NeuralNetworkFileName=None, logRegFileName=None, svmFileName=None, dictionaryFile=None, sizeX=12, sizeY=18)[source]¶
__init__(npImage=None, NeuralNetworkFileName=None, logRegFileName=None, svmFileName=None, dictionaryFile=None, sizeX=12, sizeY=18)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • npImage – numpy array of image
  • NeuralNetworkFileName – filename of trained neural network scikit recognizer
  • logRegFileName – filename of trained scikit logistic regression recognizer
  • svmFileName – filename of trained scikit support vector machine recognizer
  • dictionaryFile – mapping from character recognizer to ascii
  • sizeX – size of character in pixels in X
  • sizeY – size of character in pixels in Y

Methods

__init__([npImage, NeuralNetworkFileName, ...])
param npImage:numpy array of image
defineSixPlateCharacters(listOfListofRectangles) By support vector machine: check all plates and in each plate go through every set of 6-rectangles
defineSixPlateCharactersbyLogReg(...[, ...]) By logistic regression: check all plates and in each plate go through every set of 6-rectangles
deskew(img) descew from
getCharacter() get the current character
getFinalStrings() give the final result
get_character_by_LogReg([binary]) identify the character by logistic regression, give also probability
get_character_by_SVM([binary]) identify the character by support vector machine
get_character_by_neural_network([binary]) identify the character by neural network
preprocess_hog() picking right features, for SVM and logistic regression
preprocess_simple() no preprosesing for neural network
setCharacter([rectangle]) set the character to be recognized as numpy array
setDictionary(dictionaryFile) A dictionary containing mapping from labels of svm to ascii codes of letters or digits
setImageFromFile(imageFileName[, ...]) for debugging: image can be read also from file
setNeuralNetwork([MLPFileName]) read trained neural network
setNumpyImage(image) set image from numpy array
setSvmTrainedFile(svmFileName) load trained svm classifier
setlogReg(logRegFileName) load trained logistic regression classifier from a file
showCharacter() debugging: show the current character
